mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book( library_id, genre_no, book_name, book_author, book_publisher ) values ( #{libraryId}, #{genreNo}, #{bookName}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookPublisher} )
mapper.select: SELECT book_code as bookCode, book_name as bookName, book_author as bookAuthor, genre_no as genreNo, book_publisher as bookPublisher, state_no as stateNo, book_totalcount as bookTotalCount, book_firstday as bookFirstDay FROM book WHERE book_code = #{bookCode}
